title: Urbanization in Rwanda 2018
yAxis: Share of urban population in total population
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Share of urban population in total population, containing a total of 11 data points.
Overall Share of urban population in total population has increased over the Year.
Share of urban population in total population is roughly constant from 2008 to 2013, and lastly slightly increasing from 2013 to 2018.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2017 and 2018.
Maximum Share of urban population in total population, about 17.21 was reported at Year 2018
The lowest Share of urban population in total population, of value 16.93 was reported at Year 2008,  2009, and 2010
